# Stats and Awards

### High School

2 year varsity starter for the Ballard High School Beavers in Seattle, Washington.

2022 - As a senior received first team all league honors, while batting .340 with 3 home runs.

### Junior College

After High School I played for the Wenatchee Valley Knights for 2 years

2023 - Voted team "Hitter of the Year" as a freshman while starting 40 games and hitting 3 home runs including 2 walk-offs

2024 - Received 1st team All-Region honors, batting .278 with 50 hits, including 19 extra base hits and 4 home runs, 36 runs, 36 rbis, and 14 stolen bases, all while starting all 50 games and receiving a "Gold Glove" award

### 4-Year College

This year I transferred to Chaminade University of Honolulu to continue my athletic career
